trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*"></xref> operation.
The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property contains the status code returned by the SMTP server.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class.
The exception returned by this constructor has its <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode.GeneralFailure>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code.
This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error that occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code and error message.

This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error that occurred.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> classes.
This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.

This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error that occurred.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
Gets the status code returned by an SMTP server when an e-mail message is transmitted.
An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value that indicates the error that occurred.
Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
